title: Apple tartlets
ingredients: ['3 large apples - peeled, cored and chopped', '4 tablespoons water', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '250g plain flour', '160g porridge oats', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '340g butter']
